citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The following required records were not available at time of inspection: The written contingency plan, and the record of
animals on hand. These documents, along with the written Program of Veterinary Care and water quality and feeding
records, must be readily available for review at time of inspection as these are records required to be kept the Animal
Welfare Act and the regulations in this part.
To be corrected by November 8, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Director of Engineering.
n

2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The following required records were not available at time of inspection: The written contingency plan, and the record of 
animals on hand. These documents, along with the written Program of Veterinary Care and water quality and feeding 
records, must be readily available for review at time of inspection as these are records required to be kept the Animal 
Welfare Act and the regulations in this part. 
 
To be corrected by November 8, 2023
